_header: Stones been hard and heavy and wight

OxfMert248.Transcription:
Stanes beþ harde & heuye & wyȝthe beþ colde
                    & foule som in siȝt
OxfMert248.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.147.
